website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S4 is an excellent premium Android tablet that can also help your productivity in a pinch.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S4 raises the bar on its predecessor with a bigger display, better performance and the addition of Samsung DeX, which gives it a PC-like interface
Samsung includes an excellent S Pen for drawing and writing on the 10.5-inch display
cons: The keyboard cover is not included, it's expensive and, in the end, hurts the DeX desktop experience

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with my refurbished Tab S4! I'm loving the upgrade. I've been drawing & painting, reading comics & retro mags, taking notes & writing bad poetry. You'd think that this was my first tablet. Everything feels snappy. I take an action and get an instant response. Haven't ran into any snags. The S-Pen is on point as far as I can tell & it doesn't need to be charged. Also, it came a day early & in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: GrowlingDragon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect in every way. Klamp Electronics has always been a wonderful source for reliable refurbished tablets for me and this one and an identical one were no exception. They both were absolutely perfect and like new in every way except the box. I have recommended Klamp many times and will continue to do so. The tablet itself is great. The specs speak for themselves. I would say the finish is beautiful but slippery. If you are like me I would get a case to help prevent dropping.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: i bought this because my son has one. his seems to work alot faster than this one it lags. also the screen was all scratched up. i didnt know this was a refurbished one. it also was a week late. i would return it but they proberly have a restocking fee. it works alright for a ereader but $400 is quit expensive for a reader. also the last time i tried to return something thru amazon the shipping cost more than the project. i think it will start going back to the store for my merchandise. im dissapointed with article and amazon
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh, feels just like other tablets but slightly faster
customer_reviews.text: It was tough to be excited about this tablet. It feels just like every other tablet but with slightly better performance and battery life. Definitely not worth the upgrade from the Galaxy Tab S2 which is what I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Meyer Denney

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: Just came in today, I was excited to try this tablet out but I was extremely disappointed. Looks new, but it sure doesn’t operate like it. Initial start up and set up was painstakingly slow, pages would skip across the screen. Tried multiple resets and contacted the seller, was told to update all software and try again. Nothing fixed it, returning it today and buying new. Don’t waste your money on this refurbished junk.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Love my tablet!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is fabulous! Love it so much. Does everything I need it to. Downsides were battery life and price. Was very expensive, but should last me a long time. Battery life is not what claimed, but most of the time I have it plugged in anyway. Found a beautiful cover on Amazon and fits it perfectly. Very happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl H

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical to order this used but saw some good reviews. This tablet came in a plain white box with an unused charger and the tablet itself looks brand new as well! Highly recommend ordering this. It's $200 less than the brand new one but the same exact quality. You can go wrong with this deal. My tablet has no issues, no scratches or chips, and looks flawless. Lastly, the only gripe I have is that the tablet was loose inside the box and could've been knocked around a little bit during shipment. But don't let that stop you from ordering,ine has no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Lamb

customer_reviews.title: High quality renewed product
customer_reviews.text: The tablet shows no signs of scratch or dent. Screen has no burn in and the battery discharged cycle count shows only one. Upgrade to the newest Android pie (9.0) without any issues. Highly recommend. However, the price just dropped $27 dollars a few days after receiving the tablet. Wish there is a price adjustment within 30 days just like the retail stores. Update: Contacted the seller and received a refund for the price differences. Very good customer service experience and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CCITHACA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent condition refurbished but.....
customer_reviews.text: As of this writing, the package arrived in good condition. Relatively timely considering the state of the shipping system. However, no "S" pen as told by the description. I will adjust my review once I have the pen issue resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charging issue
customer_reviews.text: I just got the tablet today and turned it on. It came with 3% so I used the Charging brick and cable but it kept hoovering between 3 and 4% and beeping when it did so. I turned it off and let it charge but I am getting a yellow triangle symbol. What should I do?
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: RECEIVED TODAY, DEAD UPPER SCREEN
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today. While I was still trying to set things up, then half of screen appears to be dead out of no where. I decided to buy this a few days ago because my ipad air was getting old. Apparently, an ipad used more than 5 years still performs better than this "renewed" tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Fibncl

customer_reviews.title: Damaged when we opened the box
customer_reviews.text: The screen had a 3 inch scratch. My wife was so excited to get a Tab 4 that we have heard is so great. We have requested to return this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: garyg

customer_reviews.title: It's a dream you won't want to be without, move over Superman
customer_reviews.text: Stunning screen quality, faster than Superman, and a pleasure to use. Can't ask more than that out of any device and this one does it all without a stutter.
customer_reviews.author: The Raven

customer_reviews.title: When Am I Receiving My Refund??
customer_reviews.text: The Battery Runs Our Fast & Keeps Turning Off Is The Reason Why I Returned. I Sent It In With Some Items That's Already Been Returned So I'm Wondering Why Haven't I Received My Refund For This Tablet? I Tired Being Patient Since Everything Going On With Covid-19 But Now I'm Getting Frustrated Cause This Isn't A Cheap Tablet
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: Happy I bought a refurbished one! No problems so far. Came like new. Think just a little dent one end but whatever. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: LadyC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is great for replacing notebooks. The image quality is very good and it has a durable battery.
customer_reviews.author: Thailuane

customer_reviews.title: Five Star Experience !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product....Great transaction.... Would buy from "Used Gadget" ANYTIME. Thank you for the Like Brand new tablet *****
customer_reviews.author: David T

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Actually thought it was new...mine even came with the keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Utz

customer_reviews.title: Not a replacement to a laptop, but otherwise very cool.
customer_reviews.text: Well done. Wish the computer feature worked better. Otherwise, love using it as a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Galitsky

customer_reviews.text: You guys the wort peoples ever I pay for the tablet 473 i return didnt work And i got refound 310 $ where its my 160 dolars ????????
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished but looks and works like new. Awesome. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G. C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tablet
customer_reviews.text: The tablet really is amazing. I would give it 5 stars completely but my speakers were busted when I got the tablet but the seller and Samsung are both working with me to get the product fixed or replaced
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ray Pugh

customer_reviews.title: One of my most favorite purchase
customer_reviews.text: The gift is a tab s4 do I get another one?
customer_reviews.author: MR.T

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase... Came with free keyboard case... Great deal for 430$!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim k

customer_reviews.title: Boots quickly and App access is fast.
customer_reviews.text: Boots quickly and App access is fast. Much faster than my Nexus 10.
customer_reviews.author: detwiler

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a high quality tablet, this is it.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great tablet. Two times while watching a movie, traveling on an airplane, I was told by other passengers what an amazing picture it had. It's like a mini laptop, since I bought an additional keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Petrocelli

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Tablet
customer_reviews.text: So I order this Item on Thursday Morning and it arrived on Saturday morning. Fantastic. This tablet is beautiful and the colors are very vivid. No so happy with the stylus but it gets the job done. It was very easy to transfer all of my documents from the other tablet.. it's a great value for the money and I love all the storage space for my drawings.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Diaz

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S4 10.5in (S Pen Included) 64GB, Wi-Fi Tablet - Gray (Renewed)
product_meta.description: Size:64GB| Color:GrayYour Samsung experience just got better with the sleek and stylish Samsung Galaxy Tab S4 10.5" Tablet. This dynamic tablet provides the best experience across multiple platforms and allows you to explore, work and watch your favorite shows on a clear and stunningly brilliant 10.5" Multi-Touch WQXGA Super AMOLED Display (2560 x 1600). Read clearly even in bright sunlight, or keep watching what you love late into the night with a blue light filter that’s easy on the eyes. Do it all on a sleek metal frame that’s comfortable to hold. With up to 16 hours of video playback, you can power through movies, games, emails and more without stopping to recharge. Dolby Atmos surrounds you in sound, giving you a true cinematic experience. Plus, quad speakers tuned by AKG deliver true-to-life audio quality.The 64GB of built-in storage makes room for everything, from your go-to shows to your favorite memories. Plus, add a microSD card to expand your memory up to 400GB so you can keep more of your apps, photos and videos with you. Capture the perfect shot with the 13MP rear-facing camera with flash, and with the 8MP front-facing camera, your best side looks even better in video chats with friends and family. Use the integrated facial recognition and iris scanner to unlock your tablet quickly with just a look. Enhance your imagination with the included S Pen which allows you to personalize messages with GIFs and jot down ideas without unlocking your tablet. The included S Pen translates, clips, magnifies, and never needs charging. Finally, the Galaxy Tab S4 is loaded with the Android 8.0 Oreo Operating System which offers a user-friendly interface.
feature_bullets: This Certified Refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, a minimum 90-day warranty, and may arrive in a generic box. Only select sellers who maintain a high performance bar may offer Certified Refurbished products on Amazon.com
Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 MSM8998 2.35GHz 8-Core Processor - Android 8.0 Oreo Operating System
4GB RAM - 64GB Storage, expandable up to 400GB via microSD card
10.5" Multi-Touch WQXGA Super AMOLED Display (2560 x 1600) with included S Pen
Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 5.0 Connectivity - 8MP Front and 13MP Rear Camera with Flash and 8x Digital Zoom

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars88 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
